{{also|复审}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=复审|t2=覆審}}

===Etymology===
* [[復]] fù ("again") + [[審]] shěn (in the "reexamine" sense, deriving from [[審查]] shěnchá "to examine"; in the "review a legal case" sense, deriving from [[審理]] shěnlǐ "to try/hear a case")

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=fùshěn
|cat=v
}}

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[reexamine]]; to [[crosscheck]]; to [[review]]
# {{lb|zh|legal}} to [[review]] a [[legal]] [[case]]; to [[retry]] a [[case]]
